tr_quotes.quote: Büyük beyinler fikirleri, orta beyinler olayları, küçük beyinler ise kişileri konuşur.
tr_quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük zekalar, birlikte düşünür.
tr_quotes.author: Malcolm X

tr_quotes.quote: Bir gram zeka, bir kilo kültüre bedeldir.
tr_quotes.author: Lois Bromfield

tr_quotes.quote: Düşüncenin gücü, zekanın gücüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Byron

tr_quotes.quote: Zekasız kuvvet, yıkabilir; ama yapamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Cenap Şehabeddin

tr_quotes.quote: Zeka, kafanın içindeki altın madenidir.
tr_quotes.author: Pitigrilli

tr_quotes.quote: Parlak zeka, insanı bütün nimetlere kavuşturmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyadaki nüfus sürekli artar; ama toplam zeka sabit kalır.
tr_quotes.author: John Murphy

tr_quotes.quote: Zekasını inkar edenin, büyük bir zekası var demektir.
tr_quotes.author: G. E. Lessing

tr_quotes.quote: Zeka, dünyayı yerinden oynatmaya yarayan maniveladır.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Zeka, bilginin elde edilişi ve muhafaza edilişidir.
tr_quotes.author: A. North Whitehead

tr_quotes.quote: Zeki insan değil, zeka yönetir; akıllı insan değil, akıl yönetir.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Zeka, tıpkı bir tarla gibi ekilmeye ve bakılmaya muhtaçtır.
tr_quotes.author: M. T. Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Senden daha zeki insanları işe alırsan onlardan daha zeki olduğunu ispat etmiş olursun.
tr_quotes.author: R. G. Grant

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanın zekası, vereceği cevaplardan değil, asıl soracağı sorulardan anlaşılır.
tr_quotes.author: N. Levis

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın zekasını gizleyebilmesi, büyük bir zekayı gösterir.
tr_quotes.author: François de La Rochefaucauld

tr_quotes.quote: Yeryüzünde iki kuvvet var: Kılıç ve zeka, çok zaman kılıç, zeka ile mağlûp edilmiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Genceli Nizami

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanın zekası bilgisine göre değil, bilgi edinme yeteneğine göre ölçülür.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Herkes kalbinin iyiliğinden bahseder; ama kimse akıl ve zekasıyla övünmeye cesaret edemez.
tr_quotes.author: François de La Rochefaucauld

tr_quotes.quote: Zeka, ancak kendisine zorunluluk yüklenildiği zaman, yeteneklerini kullanır.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Poincare

tr_quotes.quote: Azim paha biçilmezdir; çok zeki olduğumdan değil, sorunlarla uğraşmaktan vazgeçmediğim için başarıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece kendi beynimden değil, başkasının beyninden de yararlanıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Woodrew Wilson

tr_quotes.quote: Cahil insanlar kendilerini mükemmel görmeye; zeki insanlar ise yeteneklerini hafife almaya eğilimlidirler.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Zeki bir insan, halkın pek uğursuz ve mutlak olarak kötü sandığı her hadiseye, elverişli bir açıdan bakabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Rene Descartes

tr_quotes.quote: Yalan zeka işidir, dürüstlük ise cesaret. Eğer zekan yetmiyorsa yalan söylemeye; cesaretini kullanıp dürüst olmayı dene.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenilen şeylerin büyük bir kısmının unutulduğu doğrudur; ama zekanın onlar sayesinde yaptığı ilerleme kalıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Ernest Renan

tr_quotes.quote: Delilik aptallıktan daha iyidir. Delilik var olmuş bir zekanın yok oluşudur. Aptallık ise var olmamış bir zekanın olmamaya devam edişidir.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Zekanın sakıncası, insanı devamlı surette bir şeyler öğrenmeye zorlamasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Zeka, dünyayı yerinden oynatmaya yarayan maniveladır.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Düşüncenin gücü, zekanın gücüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Lord Byron

tr_quotes.quote: Gerçekten zeki olanlar, aynı zamanda alçakgönüllü insanlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Herkes kalbinin iyiliğinden bahseder; ama kimse akıl ve zekasıyla övünmeye cesaret edemez.
tr_quotes.author: François de La Rochefaucauld

tr_quotes.quote: Zeka, ancak kendisine zorunluluk yüklenildiği zaman, yeteneklerini kullanır.
tr_quotes.author: Henry Poincare

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük beyinler fikirleri, orta beyinler olayları, küçük beyinler ise kişileri konuşur.
tr_quotes.author: Hyman Rickover

tr_quotes.quote: Zeka, kafanın içindeki altın madenidir.
tr_quotes.author: Pitigrilli

tr_quotes.quote: Senden daha zeki insanları işe alırsan onlardan daha zeki olduğunu ispat etmiş olursun.
tr_quotes.author: R. G. Grant

tr_quotes.quote: Keşke herkes alçak gönüllü olacak kadar, yüksek zekaya sahip olabilseydi.
tr_quotes.author: Atakan Korkmaz

tr_quotes.quote: Zekanın sakıncası, insanı devamlı surette bir şeyler öğrenmeye zorlamasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Sadece kendi beynimden değil, başkasının beyninden de yararlanıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Woodrew Wilson

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey daha yaratıcı, daha yıkıcı değildir; bir amaca yönelmiş bir zekadan daha fazla.
tr_quotes.author: Dan Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Öğrenilen şeylerin büyük bir kısmının unutulduğu doğrudur; ama zekanın onlar sayesinde yaptığı ilerleme kalıcıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Ernest Renan

tr_quotes.quote: Zekâmızın ölçüsü, neyi nasıl yapmayı bilmek değildir. Neyi nasıl yapmayı bilmediğimizde nasıl davrandığımızdır.
tr_quotes.author: John Holt

tr_quotes.quote: Zekâ, bizimle karanlık arasında yegâne duvardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Zeka, bence parlak bir varlık, tabiatı güzelleştiren bir süs, hayatın bir tesellisidir.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Zekanın sakıncası, insanı devamlı surette bir şeyler öğrenmeye zorlamasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Zekâ; nar, ayva ve portakal gibi, geç renk ve koku kazanan bir sonbahar mahsulüdür. En az kırk sene güneşte pişirmeden bu asil meyve ballanmıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Ahmed Haşim

tr_quotes.quote: Akıl ve zeka; ikincisi çok kullanışlı ve yararlı bir şeydir. Akıl sürekli yükselir, zekanın çıkarlarını çoğu zaman ihmal eder, küçümser, bunun için de hayal gücü ile beslenir.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Çok kimse kendindeki kusurun farkındadır, fakat açığa vurmaktan çekinir. Kendindeki kusurları görebilmek bir özelliktir, bu kusurları söyleyebilmek ikinci özellik, hele kendisiyle alay edebilmek bir zekadır.
tr_quotes.author: Orhan Kemal

en_quotes.quote: There are no great limits to growth because there are no limits of human intelligence, imagination, and wonder
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: Be as smart as you can, but remember that it is always better to be wise than to be smart
en_quotes.author: Alan Alda

en_quotes.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits
en_quotes.author: Unknown

en_quotes.quote: Talent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence wins championships
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: There is no great genius without some touch of madness
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Give me a smart idiot over a stupid genius any day
en_quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: I know that I am intelligent, because I know that I know nothing
en_quotes.author: Socrates

en_quotes.quote: Stupidity is infinitely more fascinating that intelligence. Intelligence has its limits while stupidity has none
en_quotes.author: Claude Chabrol

en_quotes.quote: Character is higher than intellect. A great soul will be strong to live as well as think
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Your intellect may be confused, but your emotions will never lie to you
en_quotes.author: Roger Ebert

en_quotes.quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings
en_quotes.author: Salvador Dali

en_quotes.quote: We have now sunk to a depth at which restatement of the obvious is the first duty of intelligent men
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: Intelligence is the ability to adapt to change
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: I'm not offended by all the dumb blonde jokes because I know I'm not dumb... and I also know that I'm not blonde
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: To expect the unexpected shows a thoroughly modern intellect
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Anyone who conducts an argument by appealing to authority is not using his intelligence; he is just using his memory
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: The brain is like a muscle. When it is in use we feel very good. Understanding is joyous
en_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

en_quotes.quote: I won't insult your intelligence by suggesting that you really believe what you just said
en_quotes.author: William F. Buckley, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: My dad used to say, 'Just because you dress up in a coat and tie, it doesn't influence your intelligence.'
en_quotes.author: Tiger Woods

en_quotes.quote: Be what you are. This is the first step toward becoming better than you are
en_quotes.author: Julius Charles Hare

en_quotes.quote: When a true genius appears, you can know him by this sign: that all the dunces are in a confederacy against him
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

en_quotes.quote: To think is to practice brain chemistry
en_quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

en_quotes.quote: Action is the real measure of intelligence
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: When I see a dolphin, I know it's just as smart as I am
en_quotes.author: Captain Beefheart

en_quotes.quote: In view of the fact that God limited the intelligence of man, it seems unfair that He did not also limit his stupidity
en_quotes.author: Konrad Adenauer

en_quotes.quote: Educate the masses, elevate their standard of intelligence, and you will certainly have a successful nation
en_quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

en_quotes.quote: Genius ain't anything more than elegant common sense
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: I'm not the smartest fellow in the world, but I can sure pick smart colleagues
en_quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

en_quotes.quote: Common sense is not so common
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: Small minds are concerned with the extraordinary, great minds with the ordinary
en_quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

en_quotes.quote: It is the mark of a truly intelligent person to be moved by statistics
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Humanity I love you because when you're hard up you pawn your intelligence to buy a drink
en_quotes.author: e. e. cummings

en_quotes.quote: Military intelligence is a contradiction in terms
en_quotes.author: Groucho Marx

en_quotes.quote: The best minds are not in government. If any were, business would steal them away
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: There are some ideas so wrong that only a very intelligent person could believe in them
en_quotes.author: George Orwell

en_quotes.quote: Philosophy is a battle against the bewitchment of our intelligence by means of language
en_quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

en_quotes.quote: For the execution of the voyage to the Indies, I did not make use of intelligence, mathematics or maps
en_quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

en_quotes.quote: Talent and intelligence never yet inoculated anyone against the caprice of the fates
en_quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: Genius is the ability to renew one's emotions in daily experience
en_quotes.author: Paul Cezanne

en_quotes.quote: To think well and to consent to obey someone giving good advice are the same thing
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: The key to artificial intelligence has always been the representation
en_quotes.author: Jeff Hawkins

en_quotes.quote: Intelligence is the wife, imagination is the mistress, memory is the servant
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Some of the greatest moments in human history were fueled by emotional intelligence
en_quotes.author: Adam Grant

en_quotes.quote: By 2029, computers will have emotional intelligence and be convincing as people
en_quotes.author: Ray Kurzweil

en_quotes.quote: What matters is hard work, and emotional intelligence
en_quotes.author: Mickey Drexler

en_quotes.quote: Leveraging community intelligence and making connections is a key component to being a growth hacker
en_quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

en_quotes.quote: Man becomes man only by his intelligence, but he is man only by his heart
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: The first method for estimating the intelligence of a ruler is to look at the men he has around him
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: There is no logical reason why the camel of great art should pass through the needle of mob intelligence
en_quotes.author: Rebecca West

en_quotes.quote: Common sense is genius dressed in its working clothes
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: I must have a prodigious quantity of mind; it takes me as much as a week sometimes to make it up
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: Immaturity is the incapacity to use one's intelligence without the guidance of another
en_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

en_quotes.quote: Intellectual passion drives out sensuality
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: A great deal of intelligence can be invested in ignorance when the need for illusion is deep
en_quotes.author: Saul Bellow

en_quotes.quote: The public is wonderfully tolerant. It forgives everything except genius
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: There is no worse screen to block out the Spirit than confidence in our own intelligence
en_quotes.author: John Calvin

en_quotes.quote: Genius is more often found in a cracked pot than in a whole one
en_quotes.author: E. B. White

en_quotes.quote: A man of genius makes no mistakes; his errors are volitional and are the portals of discovery
en_quotes.author: James Joyce

en_quotes.quote: An intellectual is someone whose mind watches itself
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: An intellectual is a man who takes more words than necessary to tell more than he knows
en_quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

en_quotes.quote: Often the hands will solve a mystery that the intellect has struggled with in vain
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: It has yet to be proven that intelligence has any survival value
en_quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

en_quotes.quote: Despite all the hype and excitement about AI, it's still extremely limited today relative to what human intelligence is
en_quotes.author: Andrew Ng

en_quotes.quote: A woman has to be intelligent, have charm, a sense of humor, and be kind. It's the same qualities I require from a man
en_quotes.author: Catherine Deneuve

en_quotes.quote: For me, a sexy man has three very important qualities: a great sense of humour, intelligence, and loyalty
en_quotes.author: Urvashi Rautela

en_quotes.quote: That which the Fascists hate above all else, is intelligence
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

en_quotes.quote: If little else, the brain is an educational toy
en_quotes.author: Tom Robbins

en_quotes.quote: We all agree that pessimism is a mark of superior intellect
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: Logical activity is not the whole of intelligence. One can be intelligent without being particularly logical
en_quotes.author: Jean Piaget

en_quotes.quote: No man likes to have his intelligence or good faith questioned, especially if he has doubts about it himself
en_quotes.author: Henry Adams

en_quotes.quote: The emotional brain responds to an event more quickly than the thinking brain
en_quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

en_quotes.quote: Many intelligence reports in war are contradictory; even more are false, and most are uncertain
en_quotes.author: Carl von Clausewitz

en_quotes.quote: Men create real miracles when they use their God-given courage and intelligence
en_quotes.author: Jean Anouilh

en_quotes.quote: I am a woman. I think I have the spirit, the intelligence, and - dare I say - the soul of a woman
en_quotes.author: Agnes Varda

en_quotes.quote: Intelligence recognizes what has happened. Genius recognizes what will happen
en_quotes.author: John Ciardi

en_quotes.quote: You can't get closer to the heart of national sovereignty than national security and intelligence services
en_quotes.author: Gijs de Vries

en_quotes.quote: Genius is talent set on fire by courage
en_quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

en_quotes.quote: Though intelligence is powerless to modify character, it is a dab hand at finding euphemisms for its weaknesses
en_quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

en_quotes.quote: Football is a game about feelings and intelligence
en_quotes.author: Jose Mourinho

en_quotes.quote: Emotion is often what we rely upon to carry us across the unfathomable voids in our intelligence
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: The voice of the intellect is a soft one, but it does not rest until it has gained a hearing
en_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

en_quotes.quote: We should take care not to make the intellect our god; it has, of course, powerful muscles, but no personality
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: If you would take, you must first give, this is the beginning of intelligence
en_quotes.author: Lao Tzu

en_quotes.quote: Shall I not have intelligence with the earth? Am I not partly leaves and vegetable mould myself
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Genius always finds itself a century too early
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: I not only use all the brains that I have, but all that I can borrow
en_quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

en_quotes.quote: There is no method but to be very intelligent
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Wit is educated insolence
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: I have beauty, intelligence, individuality, sensuality and sexuality
en_quotes.author: Shannon Tweed

en_quotes.quote: One thought fills immensity
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Always be smarter than the people who hire you
en_quotes.author: Lena Horne

en_quotes.quote: I don't think there's anything unique about human intelligence
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: It is not clear that intelligence has any long-term survival value
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Sculpture is the art of the intelligence
en_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

en_quotes.quote: Politeness decrees that you must listen to be kind; intelligence decrees that you must listen to learn
en_quotes.author: Letitia Baldrige

en_quotes.quote: The surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that it has never tried to contact us
en_quotes.author: Bill Watterson

en_quotes.quote: It takes an extraordinary intelligence to contemplate the obvious
en_quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

en_quotes.quote: I don't think the intelligence reports are all that hot. Some days I get more out of the New York Times
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I'm a big advocate of financial intelligence
en_quotes.author: Daymond John

en_quotes.quote: In intelligence work, there are limits to the amount of information one can share. Confidentiality is essential
en_quotes.author: Gijs de Vries

en_quotes.quote: So far as I can remember, there is not one word in the Gospels in praise of intelligence
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: I would like to take you seriously, but to do so would be an affront to your intelligence
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: It's a poor sort of memory that only works backwards
en_quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

en_quotes.quote: I'd rather see artificial intelligence than no intelligence
en_quotes.author: Michael Crichton

en_quotes.quote: Artificial intelligence is destroying the traditional world of work
en_quotes.author: Beppe Grillo

en_quotes.quote: In the clashes between ignorance and intelligence, ignorance is generally the aggressor
en_quotes.author: Paul P. Harris

en_quotes.quote: All intelligent thoughts have already been thought; what is necessary is only to try to think them again
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: Man is the most intelligent of the animals - and the most silly
en_quotes.author: Diogenes

en_quotes.quote: Wealth, in even the most improbable cases, manages to convey the aspect of intelligence
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: Be smarter than other people, just don't tell them so
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: You are just your intelligence
en_quotes.author: Kalpana Chawla

en_quotes.quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: The best intelligence test is what we do with our leisure
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: Intelligence is really a kind of taste: taste in ideas
en_quotes.author: Susan Sontag

en_quotes.quote: A man of genius has a right to any mode of expression
en_quotes.author: Ezra Pound

en_quotes.quote: There is not a separate God for each person. There is one universal intelligence flowing through all of us
en_quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

en_quotes.quote: I don't even call it violence when it's in self defense; I call it intelligence
en_quotes.author: Malcolm X

en_quotes.quote: The greatest scholars are not usually the wisest people
en_quotes.author: Geoffrey Chaucer

en_quotes.quote: The intelligence of few perceives what has been carefully hidden in the recesses of the mind
en_quotes.author: Phaedrus

en_quotes.quote: An intellectual is a man who doesn't know how to park a bike
en_quotes.author: Spiro T. Agnew

en_quotes.quote: Intelligence and courtesy not always are combined; Often in a wooden house a golden room we find
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: You have to be smart. The easy days are over
en_quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

en_quotes.quote: Over time I think we will probably see a closer merger of biological intelligence and digital intelligence
en_quotes.author: Elon Musk

en_quotes.quote: They say somebody's 'street smart.' I feel like, if I got intelligence, it's just a country smart
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Intelligence is not to make no mistakes, but quickly to see how to make them good
en_quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

en_quotes.quote: Man knows so much and does so little
en_quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

en_quotes.quote: Intelligence must follow faith, never precede it, and never destroy it
en_quotes.author: Thomas a Kempis

en_quotes.quote: There is no greater evidence of superior intelligence than to be surprised at nothing
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: Ignorance is bold and knowledge reserved
en_quotes.author: Thucydides

en_quotes.quote: You can't come forward against the world's most powerful intelligence agencies and be completely free from risk
en_quotes.author: Edward Snowden

en_quotes.quote: The mob spirit has grown with the increasing intelligence of the Afro-American
en_quotes.author: Ida B. Wells

en_quotes.quote: I've written a number of books that have to do with the evolution of humans, human intelligence, human emotions
en_quotes.author: Carl Sagan

en_quotes.quote: Foolishness is rarely a matter of lack of intelligence or even lack of information
en_quotes.author: John McCarthy

en_quotes.quote: I ultimately got into robotics because for me, it was the best way to study intelligence
en_quotes.author: Sebastian Thrun

en_quotes.quote: I really admire a woman for her intelligence, her personality. Beauty is not enough
en_quotes.author: Roberto Cavalli

en_quotes.quote: Genius is initiative on fire
en_quotes.author: Holbrook Jackson

en_quotes.quote: There is no reason and no way that a human mind can keep up with an artificial intelligence machine by 2035
en_quotes.author: Gray Scott

en_quotes.quote: I think intelligence is usually sexy until it becomes irritating. After that, you're stuck
en_quotes.author: Jim Parsons

en_quotes.quote: There is nobody so irritating as somebody with less intelligence and more sense than we have
en_quotes.author: Don Herold

en_quotes.quote: We focus on a unique form of artificial intelligence called artificial swarm intelligence
en_quotes.author: Louis B. Rosenberg

en_quotes.quote: No sooner does man discover intelligence than he tries to involve it in his own stupidity
en_quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

en_quotes.quote: It is good to rub and polish our brain against that of others
en_quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

en_quotes.quote: Man is an intelligence in servitude to his organs
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Advertising: the science of arresting the human intelligence long enough to get money from it
en_quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

en_quotes.quote: Like many intellectuals, he was incapable of saying a simple thing in a simple way
en_quotes.author: Marcel Proust

en_quotes.quote: Scepticism, that dry caries of the intelligence
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: Genius creates, and taste preserves. Taste is the good sense of genius; without taste, genius is only sublime folly
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: The bookful blockhead, ignorantly read, With loads of learned lumber in his head
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: The intelligent man who is proud of his intelligence is like the condemned man who is proud of his large cell
en_quotes.author: Simone Weil

en_quotes.quote: Whatever debases the intelligence degrades the entire human being
en_quotes.author: Simone Weil

en_quotes.quote: I know from personal experience that the abuse of prisoners will produce more bad than good intelligence
en_quotes.author: John McCain

en_quotes.quote: God is another name for human intelligence raised above all error and imperfection, and extended to all possible truth
en_quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

en_quotes.quote: I can't tell you if genius is hereditary, because heaven has granted me no offspring
en_quotes.author: James Whistler

en_quotes.quote: The No. 1 thing I am earnestly attracted to is intelligence
en_quotes.author: Rachel Bloom

en_quotes.quote: Intelligence agencies keep things secret because they often violate the rule of law or of good behavior
en_quotes.author: Julian Assange

en_quotes.quote: This illusion that a lower class has less intelligence than a higher class is a complete fake-out
en_quotes.author: Anohni

en_quotes.quote: It's going to be interesting to see how society deals with artificial intelligence, but it will definitely be cool
en_quotes.author: Colin Angle

en_quotes.quote: By far, the greatest danger of Artificial Intelligence is that people conclude too early that they understand it
en_quotes.author: Eliezer Yudkowsky

en_quotes.quote: Iron sharpens iron; scholar, the scholar
en_quotes.author: William Drummond

en_quotes.quote: I think a lot of jobs, with that additional artificial intelligence, we can augment human capabilities and impact
en_quotes.author: Jean-Philippe Courtois

en_quotes.quote: We should never overestimate an audience's culture, but we should never underestimate their intelligence
en_quotes.author: Robert Lepage

en_quotes.quote: Grit can't be measured on pop quizzes, but it can often predict long-term success more than mere intelligence
en_quotes.author: Laura Moser

en_quotes.quote: I do feel more towards certain characters who have depth and intelligence
en_quotes.author: Allison Scagliotti

en_quotes.quote: The intelligent man is one who has successfully fulfilled many accomplishments, and is yet willing to learn more
en_quotes.author: Ed Parker

en_quotes.quote: God has placed no limits to the exercise of the intellect he has given us, on this side of the grave
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: A person must have a certain amount of intelligent ignorance to get anywhere
en_quotes.author: Charles Kettering

en_quotes.quote: We are dealing with the best-educated generation in history. But they've got a brain dressed up with nowhere to go
en_quotes.author: Timothy Leary

en_quotes.quote: The universe is an intelligence test
en_quotes.author: Timothy Leary

en_quotes.quote: Every true genius is bound to be naive
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: A woman uses her intelligence to find reasons to support her intuition
en_quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as an underestimate of average intelligence
en_quotes.author: Henry Adams

en_quotes.quote: I'm every bourgeois nightmare - a Cockney with intelligence and a million dollars
en_quotes.author: Michael Caine

en_quotes.quote: An intelligence test sometimes shows a man how smart he would have been not to have taken it
en_quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

en_quotes.quote: An intelligent person is never afraid or ashamed to find errors in his understanding of things
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill
